name: helloworld1
description: 1) Make sure the ask-sdk is installed (npm install ask-sdk) 2) remove any existing zip file.  3) inside this directory, zip up all files "zip -r helloworld1.zip" * 4) Make sure your aws credentials are current 5) Upload the zip to your lambda function. 	aws lambda update-function-code --function-name HelloWorld1 --zip-file fileb://helloworld1.zip This will upload the file helloworld1.zip to the existing function called HelloWorld1
